basics.name: Swoop
basics.label: EWU Mascot
basics.summary: Swoop, Eastern Washington University's mascot, is an ambassador, spirit leader, and fun-loving character for the University. A popular character among EWU fans, alumni, & students, he’s adored by all walks of life. His charm, attitude, and high-spirited personality combine to make up why he’s America’s Favorite Mascot.

work.summary: EWU has been a member of the Big Sky athletic conference since 1987; the school's mascot is Swoop and the school colors are red and white.
highlights: In 1973, Eastern’s mascot became the Eagles. Shortly before that, the university’s board of trustees declared the “Savages” (the school’s mascot since 1923) unacceptable.
The new mascot was originally known as Victor E. Eagle.
He appears much friendlier, too. Wherever he goes, Swoop now has a smile on his beak.

skills.name: Pride
keywords: Swoop versus Youdee has more than 25,600 views!
Performers are EWU students receive scholarships
Swoop’s rendition of the Dougie is classic

references.name: Steve Emtman
references.reference: I may be Husky, but I was raised in Cheney, WA as an Eagle.

references.name: Todd McFarlane
references.reference: I worked on Spiderman, Hulk, and Batman. I created Spawn. I wish I had created Swoop.
